11.content:
The story begins at an old peaceful village called Karosa. A farmer named Jack was day dreaming on branch of an old strong tree on top of a hill. Later jack's mom arrives on top of the hill.

"Jack...Jack.....JACK!!!" Jack's mom yelled. Jack was startled and fell off of the branch And landed on his back. "did you have a nice nap?" Jack's mom asked sarcastically with a smile. "I wasn't napping, I was just.... Resting my eyes."Jack said as he gets up and brushes the leaves off of him. "what is it?" "did you forget what day it is already?" "Huh?" "The royal family of paragon will make a public appearance in Karosa soon." Jack's mom said. The news shocked Jack, he's been looking forward on seeing and meeting the Royal family since he ever heard of the kingdom. Jack grabbed his stuff and ran down towards the Town square.

When Jack makes it to the town square, it's already piled up with people wanting to watch the royal family as well. Jack could barely see the royal family pass the crowd of people until suddenly, his eye caught a glimpse of a redhead is a dress being taken in a dark alley. Expecting trouble, Jack walks along towards the dark alley the redhead was pulled from.

Upon arrival, Jack finds the redhead girl against a wall with her mouth covered, her arms tied with Two bandits in front of her. "look Tutts, this doesn't have to be difficult." The short bandit said with a smirk and a shrug of his shoulders. "Duh, yeah, we were wondering if we could have your autograph, Please?"The big bandit ask with his hands together and a smile. "darn it Robert, we are bandits, we took her to rob her, not to ask for an autograph!" The short bandit said with an angry look on his face."Hay, Leave her alone!"Jack said as the bandits look behind them to see who said that."Oh yeah,What are you going to do about it?" The short bandit says with a confident grin and his arms folded. " I- i'll.... I'll call the guards on you." Jack said as he stuttered then a confident look on his face as he pointed at them. "uh George, maybe we should leave her alone before we get in trouble." "oh shut up Robert and get this guy!" George said as his face gets red with anger. Robert charges in with a right punch. but Jack managed to dodge his attack no problem. It did not only surprise Robert but Jack as well. Jack never fight before in his life. Robert then through a series of punches, both dodged by Jack. But then, Robert goes for a powerful right punch and his fist goes through the brick wall. What Robert open his eyes, Jack was on top of his arm. Acting quickly, Jack grabs a wooden bucket from the outside countertop and slams it on Roberts head. "Hay, I can't see. Everything is dark."Robert said as he walks around blindly with a bucket on his head. Meanwhile, George took the redhead girl's necklace. "Hey, big guy, I'm down here." Jack said trying to lead Roberts towards George. "What the- " "I got you now. Hey George, I got him!" ...Good for you..." Huh?" "You got me you idiot!" George yelled loud enough and long enough for the guards to notice that the princess was missing. "The princess is gone." The guard whispers to the nobleman. "What?!" The noble man asked as he walked around in search of her. "Darn it! let's get out of here!" George said as they both Ran away. Jack walks runs over and unties the rope from her arms and the rage from her mouth. "Are you okay?" Jack asked the girl as he helped her up. "I'm fine I'm a little shaken up, but I'm-"just as she's about to finish both Jack at the girls eyes met. Are-ah, you okay? The girl asked as she stutters "uh... Yeah... I think so."Jack said as he blushes and scratch the back of his head. " sorry.i'm Jack." Jack said as he stutters " I'm-" Maria!" Cried the nobleman as he finally found the princess "step away from her, you Pezzente."but nobleman said as he sucker punch Jack out cold. "Marcus stop! this man saved me." Maria said just before Marcus pulled out his sword "I told you not to walk away from me. Do you know how dangerous these people are?! Let's get out of here." Marcus said as he grabs Maria's arm and pulls her away from Jack. "i'm sorry."Maria said as they walk away, leaving Jack alone unconscious on the ground as it starts to rain.
11.title: The Farmer

111.content:
About an hour later. Jack manages to open his eyes from the last raindrop that touch them. then struggles to get on his feet. Immediately he feels the pain on his cheek from that knockout punch. "Ow... So much for gratitude." Jack said as he placed his hand over his cheek. When Jack looked down in front of his feet. He finds Maria's necklace that George dropped. Jack kneeled down to grab the necklace, then he shakes his head with a sad face as he place the necklace in his bag, hoping to give it back to her, someday. With his clothes all wet from the rain, Jack walks Out from the dark alley.

Suddenly, dark clouds start to form and expand, covering the morning sky. Jack and All the townsfolk looked up at the clouds as the temperature suddenly gets more warmer than before, causing the rain on the ground to change into a blinding fog. "something isn't right here." Jack whispered to himself as everyone was scared and confused.

Suddenly, giant balls of fire rains down on the village. All of the townsfolk ran and screamed through the fog. Jack was paralyzed on the spot as he watches the chaos in front of him, until he realized that his mother was calling his name. "MOM!" Jack yelled as he ran and tries to follow the sound of her voice. Pass the screaming crowd, Jack dodges the the incoming balls of fire from left to right. Before Jack makes it to his house, One fireball manages to hit Jack in the back, knocking him off his feet and crashes through the door.
"Jack..." His mother said as she was lying on the corner,mortally wounded. Jack stared at his mother in disbelief as he tries to stand up from the pain on his body "Mother! What's going on here?! What happened?!" Jack asked as he tries to stop the bleeding from his mothers belly. "... The dark Tower, ah... Is returning... It found us." Jack's mother replied as she struggles to stay awake with her hand on her locket " we need to leave, now!" " I...won't make it...I'll slow you down." "Mother!" Jack yelled as his eyes starts to cry. Lis-, listen to me my son.... The kingdom... is In danger. (Cough cough)... Take this locket... And Save the kingdom... I have faith in you. (Cough cough)" jack's mother said as she gave Jack the locket. " now go... You survive." Mother said as the house starts fall apart from the balls of fire. Jack leaves his mother with a kiss on her four head and runs away from the collapsing house and the dark clouds. When Jack got away from the danger. He looked at his village one last time and then ran towards the forest.
111.title: The Red Sky.

1111.content:
Later that night, jack kept on running with the tears in his eyes covering his vision. Causing him to trip over a fallen log, tumbling down a hill and fallen flat on his face. When jack got up on his hands and knees, he pound the ground with his fist before he remembers he still had his mothers locket on his hand. When Jack wiped the tears off his eyes and finds himself near a pond in the middle of the forest. Jack walks to the edge of the pond and washes off the blood off his hands and the locket. After jack wash is his face, he looks at his own reflection from the pond. "Take this locket, and save the kingdom. I have faith in you." Jack remembers his mother's last word's as he stars at his mother's locket. "How am I supposed to do that, and why. I don't know what to-" before jack could finish, he hears a voice calling out for help. Jack quickly where's the locket around his neck and runs toward the sound of the women's voice.

The voice was coming from a cave which was being blocked by giant boulders and rocks. "Hello, is someone in here?!" "Yes. Hello? I'm trapped in here and and this is crushing me, please help!" The woman in the cave replied as jack can here the pain of her words. Jack tries to move one the boulders. "It won't budge!" "Darn it, there must be some way." " okay, just hold on and stay put, I'll, see if I can find a way inside." Jack said to the woman as he looks around the mountain for a way inside the cave. With no luck finding a way in. Jack climbs to the top of the mountain and found an old well.

Curious on knowing how deep the well goes. Jack grabs a gold coin from his money pouch and drops it in the well. Jack was Unable to hear the sound of a coin drop. "Lady, I think I found a way in! if you can hear me, I'm coming down!" Jack yelled to the woman as he claims in the well. "Please hurry, I-, I can't feel my wings!" "Your what?!" jack said as he losses his grip, causing him to fall down below the well to the cave.

Luckily, Jack manage to break his fall by landing on a pool of water. When jack climbed out of the pool. The light from the moon starts to illuminate the inside of the cave. But when jack looked around, it was not just a cave, it was a temple, an underground temple. Jack was amazed of what he stumbled across. Until jack heard a growl coming from behind him. When jack slowly turns around and found a dragon laying on it's side with it's wings being crushed by a large bolder.

"Lady?" Jack asked the dragon when he recognize her voice and slowly walks closer to the dragon. When the dragon opened her eyes and finds jack walking cautiously towards her. She gives a warning flame flying out of her mouth, causing jack to take two steps back. "Get away from me!" The dragon spoke as she struggles to move with the pain of her wings being crushed by the boulder. "Huh, a human? Who are you, What are you doing here, are you lost?" "Um, which question would you like me to answer first?" "... very well. The second one." I came to rescue you. Is that so, we'll then, if you can get this thing off of me. I would be great full. The dragon said as she struggles to move with her mind over the painful crushing of her wings. Jack nodded then he tries to push the boulder away from the dragon's wings. When the boulder was rolled off.

The dragon stands up with the sound of the stiff bones in her body as she stretches with a deep sigh of relief. "You helped me, thank you." The dragon said as she bowes her head to jack. "It was nothing." Jack said with a smile. "What where you doing here, anyway." "I was... hiding." "Hiding, from what?" "That's, all you need to know." The dragon said as she walks past jack and heads toward the dark hallway, then jack try's to catch up with her.

When jack and the dragon reached to the end of the hallway, it was too dark to see. But the dragon closed her eyes, follows the scent of coal and uses her fire breath to light the coal. Suddenly, the flame starts to follow a trail of coal leading to a table, next to a stone wall on the other side of the bridge. "What is this place?" "Your guess is as good as mine, human." "Please call me jack." "Pleasure to meet you, jack." "Do you have a name?" "I'm... Whispa." after the conversation, jack and whispa reaches to what seems to be a dead end wall with ancient carvings on it. Jack was looking at a strange looking stone, displayed on the table.

"The Peacekeepers." Whispa said when she recognize the symbol on the wall. "The what?" "The Peacekeepers, it's an old legend of the five guardians who saved the land of peragon many years ago." Whispa said as she tries to make sense of all this. Jack reaches over to grab the strange stone. Then suddenly. A bright light shines from the stone, causing the wall to disappear in a bright flash of light. "How did you do that?" Whispa said. "I think it has something to do. with this."Jack said as he shows whispa the unknown stone shard that caused it. Suddenly the power from the stone causes a cave quake. "We need to leave, now!" Whispa yelled over the sound of the temple falling apart. Jack and whispa runs through the tunnel witch was opened from the stone wall.

"Jack, Look, a way out!" Whispa said as they get closer to the end of the cave. Suddenly the ground falls apart after whispa ran past it. Jack tries to jump over the large gap and holds on the ledge for dear life. "Jack!" Whispa yelled when she stopped and saw jack hanging on the ledge. When jack lost his grip, whispa managed to catch him with her tail. "Hold on tight!" Whispa yelled when she tossed jack on her back, then ran out of the cave. When whispa jumps out of the cave, she was unable to fly with her broken wings. So then they feel into a river near a water fall.

Whispa climbed out of the river with jack still on her back. Jack climbs off of her back and sites down against a tree to catch his breath. "Hay, it's been, nice to make your acquaintance."Whispa said when she looks up at the sky. "Huh, where are you going?" Jack asked when whispa walks away. "...Some where hide." "Don't you have a home or family?" "Don't you?" Whispa said as she turns and looks at jack. Whispa continued to walk away with her head facing down with a sorry look.. "...there's always tomorrow jack. There's always tomorrow. " Jack said to himself befor he falls asleep.

Meanwhile at a mercenary outpost. The mercenary leader runs to his office and finds his map glowing with the location of the stone that Jack holds. "Rebecca." The Leader calls for his second in command. "You ring, boss?" Rebecca said as she leans against a wall in the shadows, holding her mask in her hand. "I need you to hunt someone down and bring me this artifact.. The leader said as he leans and points to the picture of the artifacts on the table. "Who is the target?" "His name is jack. You will find him at the town square near. Paragon castle." "Consider it done." Rebecca said when she puts on her mask with a devious smile on her face.
1111.title: The Dragon.

11111.content:
The next day, jack arrives to the city of paragon. "Wow, so this is the kingdom, it's... amazing." Jack said as he looks around the city and the castle. Suddenly the pain in his back from the impact of the fireball starts to take its toll. Jack looks around in search for a hospital. When Jack found the hospital, he knocks on the door as the pain gets worse. "Now look here if you're going to-" the doctor stopped talking when he opened the door and saw jack gritting his teeth in pain. "Good heavens boy, what happened to you?" The doctor asked as he helps jack inside.

Later that day. The doctor and his assistant treated Jack's wounds with a bandage around his back." There you go, how are you feeling." "I feel, great." Jack said as he slowly Stands up from the hospital bed. "It will take time for your back to fully heal from... How did you get this injury?" "I Uh, fell on a campfire. And, burnt my shirt apparently." Jack said knowing that he could not believe what happened to him if he told him the truth. "Well, be more careful next time you go out camping." "Uh, yeah I will. Also could I have these bandages, for next time I get Clumsy." "Very well, help yourself." "Thank you for your help, my name's Jack by the way." "dr. Jefferson, pleased to meet a friendly face once in a while." Dr. Jefferson said as he shakes hands with Jack.

When Jack leaves the hospital, he finds a whole group of people gathered in front of a balcony at the Castle grounds. When Jack walks closer to see what's going on. Rebecca wearing a dark blue hooded robe and mask starts to tail him. In the center of the crowd, jack saw Princess Maria next to the noble man Marcus as he prepares a speech. "People of Paragon, I regret to inform you that the village of Karosa was attacked by bandits." "liar, it wasn't bandits." Jack whispers to himself as he remembers that terrible night. After the speech, when Jack noticed that his money pouch was stolen, he saw Rebecca showing him his money pouch as she looks at him with the corner of her eye with a devious laugh. "hey, get back here!" Jack yelled as he chases after the thief. "Huh, is that...?" Maria said when she saw Jack chasing The thief. "Maria, is there something the matter?" "excuse me, Marcus." Maria said before she tries to follow Jack.

The Chase ends up in an empty church. Suddenly, the large doors of the church was locked up tight with Jack and Rebecca inside and Maria outside. "Not exactly the best place for a confrontation, but it will do." Rebecca said as she sits on the stone table with her legs crossed. "Hm... You don't seem to be the troublemaking type, are you Jack?" "How did you know my name?" "Oh, I'm sorry, you may call me Rebecca. My boss sent me to kill you."Rebecca said as she points to Jack with a surprised look on his face. "Nothing personal." Rebecca said as she drops her hooded robe on the floor, pulls out her sword and tries to strike Him but Jack managed to dodge her attack. Jack kept on blocking and dodging her attacks using the items around the church until Rebecca swings her sword upward and breaking jack's locket just inches away from his neck. Followed up with a side kick to his gut, causing him to fly off his feet and land on his back. When jack struggles to get up. Rebecca points her sword to his neck. "Not bad, jack, but this is where the fun ends." Rebecca said as she makes ready to stab Jack. But then Rebecca caught sight of jack's locket on the ground next to Rebecca. "where. Where did you get this?"Rebecca asked Jack as she picks up the broken locket, causing her to have flashbacks of what she did. "That locket belongs to my mother, give it back."Jack said as he struggles to get up once again. Rebecca looks at Jack with a stunned look on her face. Suddenly, the guards outside the church tries to break down the doors, then Rebecca grabs her robe and disappeared in the shadow.

When the guards broke open the doors, they pointed their spears at Jack as he was standing up. " Jack?" "Maria" Jack said as he saw Maria walking inside. "your Majesty, you know this man?" "put your weapons down soldier, this man rescued me." Maria said, then the guards points their spears away from Jack and went back to their post. "Jack, I am so glad that you are alright." "Likewise… your majesty."Jack said as he and Maria smiles. "please, walk with me, tell me what happened." Maria said then Jack followed Maria outside the church and into the city.

Later that day, Jack told Maria about his home being destroyed. While they were sitting on a bench "somehow I survived, and they did not..." Jack said before he Shaded a tear, Maria grabbed his hand causing Jack to blush as he looks over at Maria. "i'm so sorry."Maria said. Suddenly a crazy terrified beggar runs inside the city. "dragon, there's a Dragon out there!" The crazy beggar Shouted as the guards restrained him. The news made Jack worried that someone may have found Whispa. "Jack, where are you going?" "Sorry Maria, got to run." Jack said as he runs outside the city walls, toward the Forest.

Meanwhile, Whispa was being chased by a group of hunters. But then she stopped at a dead end cliff . When Whispa looked behind her, the hunters cornered her to the edge of the cliff. "whispa!" Jack yelled as he saw whispa being cornered by the hunters. "Leave, me, alone." Whispa said as the hunters gets closer to her. "just leave me alone." "Time to Claim our prize." One of the hunters said as the group pulled out their weapons. "I said, leave...me...ALONE!!!!" Whispa shouted as the flame in their heart starts to grow. Causing her claws, teeth, tail, and horns to grow sharper. Causing the scales on her skin to grow stronger. Lastly her eyes change to a fiery glow. followed up with a loud roar. Jack stopped a couple of feet away from the hunters when whispa changed to her rage state. When the hunters attack. Whispa defeated them with her tail and head. With the last hunter still standing. he picks up a longsword and charges in to strike her but Whispa grabs for longsword with her teeth. Then she tosses the Hunter holding the sword off the cliff.

While Whispa was catching her breath, Jack slowly step closer, until he steps and brakes a stick. Causing Whispa to tackle Jack. "Whispa, it's me!" Jack yelled as he closes his eyes bracing for the worst while Whispa is holding Jack down with her Paw. When The flame in her heart dies down, Whispa regains her normal state. "Huh, jack. Oh no, I i'm sorry, I did not hurt you, did I?" Whispa asked as she takes her paw off of Jack and tries to help him up. "don't worry, I'm ok. I'm just glad that you came to your senses." Jack said as he placed his hand on whispa's back. " You need a place to hide and I need a New place to call home. Maybe we should travel together."Jack said as he picks up a spear from the dead Hunter when he closes his eyelids. "Why, I would like that, thank you." "also, if we ever run into the those types of guys again, do your best to fightback but please. try not to kill.... No one deserves to die." Jack said before he breaks off the arrowhead of the spear with his foot. "promise?" Jack asked as he offers his hand to shake for the promise to be kept. "... Promise." Whispa said after she looked at the damage that she made, then she shakes Jack's hand with her paw. Jack and Whispa smiled at each other knowing that they just became good friends.


Meanwhile, on top of a clock tower. Rebecca spy's on Jack and whispa. "You won't get away from me this time. Farm-boy." Rebecca said as she holds Jack's locket with her hand
11111.title: The City Of Peace.

111111.content:
Later that day, Jack and Whispa was walking alongside a road. "hey whispa, what was that thing you did back there." Jack asked whispa. "... That was my rage state. It's easy to start but, difficult to Control and stop. My people where called Monsters for that same reason. they lose control then they act on instinct." "I see, If you didn't go to your rage state, you would've been dead from those hunters."Jack said as he understands how Whispa survives in self-defense. "are your wings still Broken? I have some bandage straps in my bag. It might not be much but it could help your wings to heal up." Jack said as he puts his hand on his bag. "Why are you helping me? Why are you not afraid? I mean... I am a dragon. And your... A human." Whispa said in a confused tone. Jack pause then he looked away with a troubling expression on his face "I wish I had an answer for that but-" before Jack can finish talking in his head. He hears something coming closer further down the road. "Hide."Jack said as they look around for place to hide. Jack hides behind a tree while Whispa hides behind A large rock

The sound was coming from a carriage with four guards in horseback in a square formation around the carriage. When the carriage passed by, Jack caught sight of Maria in the carriage. Jack manage to cover his mouth before he calls out Maria so that he won't spook her or the guards. Suddenly The guards were shot and killed by bandit archers perched on top of the trees. After the surprise attack, Rebecca was leaning against and standing on a tree. When the bandits came closer to the carriage. Jack steps out with his broken spear. "There you are you slippery little-"before Rebecca could finish, there was a loud roar coming from the sky. "Oh no, not now." Whispa said whether she saw a armored dragon flying overhead searching for her. The loud roar scared the horses causing them to run away, along with the carriage with Maria still inside. Running out of time, Jack runs past the spaced out bandits and jumps on to a seemingly brave horse to rescue Maria.

After running past the Forest. Jack gets closer and closer to the runway carriage."Jack!" Maria Shouted when she saw him right next to the carriage.
"Maria, Open the door!" Jack Shouted as he struggles to stay alongside with the carriage. "what should I do?!" "Jump to me!" "What!" Maria Shouted with a scared look on her face. "you've got to jump!" "I- I can't!" "yes you can, this road won't last forever and I can't get closer to you!" Jack yelled. The runaway carriage was heading towards a cliff. "Do you trust me?" "... Yes!" "Then Jump... Please."Jack said as he reaches out to catch her. Maria closes her eyes and jumps out towards Jack. When the horses broke free and the carriage fell down the cliff. Jack managed to keep a stronghold on Maria's hand as the horse stops just inches away from the cliff.

Later that night. Jack and Maria got off of the horse and set down on a hillside to catch their breath. "You were amazing back there."Jack said as he smiles "I took a leap of faith and you rescued me, twice even. Thank you." "... It was nothing."Jack says as he blushed and smiled once more. "So what will you be doing now?" Maria asked. "well I've been looking around for a roof over my head but." "you're looking for a house? I think I have just the thing."Maria said as she grabs Jack by the hand and leads him to an Old abandon clock tower looking over the ocean and the kingdom of Paragon. "It's perfect." "consider it as a gift for saving my life." "I appreciate the kindness, your majesty. Thank you." "you can call me that when were in the city. But please, call me Maria."Maria said causing Jack to blush. "until we meet again, hero."Maria said when she climbs on the horse then rides back to the castle. "Who was that?"Whispa said suddenly surprising Jack. "that was the Princess. And she just helped us find a new Home."Jack said, then Him and Whispa went inside the Clocktower.

Meanwhile at the mercenary outpost. "what do you mean you where able to kill him!" The mercenary Leader Shouted. "... I'm sorry boss, he, caught me off guard. Not only that, but.. He seems to have... A dragon by his side. A actual fire breathing Dra-" The dragon is of no concern. I need you to focus on defeating him and Bring me that stone" "... as you wish. Father." Rebecca said as she walks away.
111111.title: Home sweet home.

1111111.content:
The next day, in the Clocktower. Jack and whispa Where dismantling the large bell. "Bring it down. nice and easy." Jack said "it's..easier said than done, you know." Whispa Grants as she lowers the bell using the rope, with her teeth. Suddenly the sound of someone knocking on the door caused Whispa to open her mouth causing the bell to fall inches away from where Jack was standing. "Sorry!" Whispa apologize. "What?! Hold on I think someone's at the door!" Jack shouted with his ears ringing from the bell as he opens the door to see who it is. "Hello?!" "Are you Mr. Jack?" "What?!" "I said, are you Mr. Jack?!!" "yes I am, but there's no need to shout. Jack said as his ears stopped ringing. "... (Cough), I am a messenger from paragon Castle. Her Majesty, princess Maria sent me to invite you to this years royal ball at the Castle tonight." The messenger said as he gave Jack the invitation and putting out his hand expecting a tip for the delivery. Jack steps inside,grabs a fresh apple, and gives it to the messenger. "what is this?" "That is an Apple, it's good for you, bye-bye." Jack said then he closes the door and the messenger walks away. "What's that you have there?" Whisper asked "It's an invitation from Maria for the royal ball tonight." "why that's wonderful... Yet you are not happy." Believe me I'm grateful. it's just, I don't have anything good to wear, all I have here is my Torn up Clothes." Jack said as he points to his old clothes that he's wearing. suddenly someone else was knocking on the door. When Jack open the door, there was a package on the doorstep with a note. "See you there." The note reads. Jack open the package and finds a High class suit. "Jack, what's inside the box?" Whispa asked. "It's a suit. Looks like I'm going to the ball after all." Jack said as he looks at whispa with a smile.

Later today, after putting on his New suit. Jack gets ready to head on out to the castle. "Will you be alright here by yourself?" Jack asked in a concern Town. "relax, I'll be fine, now go and enjoy yourself, go on." whisper said as she nudges Jack with her head to the door. With a smile and a wave, Jack heads towards the Castle. Meanwhile the bandit brothers were hiding behind the bushes as they saw Jack walk away from his house. "Bingo." George said with a grin. "Polo!" Robert yelled before George puts his hand in front of this month. Look at that there's bound to be some treasure in that house. Let's go."George said as they both sneak inside the Clocktower. When the door swing open, whispa look down from The inside balcony and saw the two bandits stealing. whispa smiled and she thinks of an idea to pass the time and to scare off the bandits.

Later that night in the castle. The butler walks inside with Jack and introduces him to the rest of the Nobles and higher classes. After the awkward silence, The music resumes playing and Nobles resumed as well. Jack makes his way to the buffet table as he awaits for Maria's arrival. "Not bad, I thought that suit would suit you." "Rebecca, what are you doing here?!" Jack said as he quickly grabs a chicken leg and points it at her. "relax, I'm not going to fight you. Not tonight at least." "were you invited?" "Huh, Who needs invitations when you can dress up like them. In this kingdom as long as you have the gold, they don't care who you are... Typical royalty." Rebecca said in a sour town. Suddenly the sound of trumpets catches the attention of everyone in the castle. "ladies and gentlemen, her Majesty princess Maria." The Butler said as Maria makes his way down the stairs. "wow, She looks, beautiful." Jack said as he looks at Maria. "I don't think you're her type." "Jack." Princess Maria said as she waved at jack. "She knows you?" "I, ran into her a few times" Jack said as he scratches the back of his Head. "... I'll just leave the two of you alone."Rebecca said then she disappears as she blends in with the crowd. "Jack, I'm glad you came." "I am honored to receive your invitation."Jake said as he blushed from the site of her smile. "Please,come with me, there someone that I would like you to meet" Maria said as she walks with jack over to Marcus. "Marcus." "Maria. How are you my love?" "I am fine. There's someone-" "Who are you, what are you doing here, this place is for Royal members only. " "Marcus please, this man is my savior I was telling you about. I invited him." "What?" "This is Jack from Karosa, he rescued me." "when you were wandering off?" Marcus said causing Maria to look away to her shoulder. "now if you'll excuse me, I have work to do." Marcus said as he makes his way to the war room. "A survivor from Karosa? but, he can't be." Rebecca said when she eavesdrop on the conversation. "He seems nice." Jack said in a sarcastic tone. I'm sorry. he's not usually like this but he keeps on treat me like a little girl." "Is he your brother, or something?" "...not exactly. But enough about me. please enjoy yourself. and jake....thank you." Maria said with a smile as she walks away to talk with the Nobles causing Jack to smile back.

A group of shady Noble guards walked up to Jack. "Hey, are you the farmer?" "Well I'm A farmer so-" before Jack could finish, The guards grab jack and taken him to a abandoned storage room. "let's make this quick before the guards finds out where we are." The fake Guard said as they pull out there disguise revealing themselves as mercenaries. After jack takes a couple of hits. The mercenaries pulls out there daggers and attempts to stab jack. But then Jack manages to counter their attacks as he disarms and knocks out the mercenaries. Suddenly A mercenary flies through the door from Rebecca's sidekick. ".....we have a problem." Rebecca said when she saw Jack standing next to the knocked out mercenaries.

"Rebecca my girl, there is absolutely no reason for you to feel sorry for yourself. After all, his mother is the reason you're mother and my wife is gone." "Liar!... My mother would never do that!" The leader of The mercenaries. Your father and I ...were good Friends." "My father?" "yes, Benjamin. You never heard of him?" "....?" "did your mother ever told you?!" "Huh?" "HE WAS A LEGEND!!!" Gavin shouted then he punched Jack in the face, causing Rebecca to take one step forward with the surprised look on her face.

"Many years ago. Benjamin created The peacekeepers. they were paragons finest warriors. One of them was my wife, Rosie." Gavin said as he flashback to the year of what happened. "Mother..." Whispa asked with concern when the guards left the dungeon. "...." "Jack?" "....no...i'm not alright...but thanks for asking..." "Jack...are you...crying?" "......yeah..." "what's wrong?" "it's complicated." "Jack?" "you don't want to hear it!" "Jack!... Please." ".....I am to be executed....." Jack said after he wipes away his tears, then he tells Whispa what happened and what's going to happen. "...Wow..." Whispa spoke after the silent pause. "...Yep..." "So your-?" "yes." "You survive the-?" "that's right." "and they're going to-?!" "exactly." "My people, they're in danger. we got to do something." ".....there's nothing we can do." "What? We can't call it quits. innocent lives will be in the crossfire!" "Enough!" Jack shouted as he takes his anger out on the cell door. "I have nothing to fight for." "but, your a peacekeeper." "i'm just a Farmer, without a farm... Without a home... Without a family." "it's over..." Jack said as he leaned his head down and Whispa sheds a tear. "He's right." Rebecca said as she appeared from the shadows. "You! How long were you standing there?!" Whispa asked as she growled at the unknown stranger. "Long enough, to know what's going on." Rebecca said as she unlocks, opens, and walks inside jacks cell. "What do you want?" "...answers." Rebecca said as she takes out Jack's locket from her pocket and tossed it to him. After Jack catch it, it was open, and he saw a picture of his mother and father inside the locket. "I need to know. did she kill my mother?" "... Your an assassin. why do you care about the person you kill?" "You think I enjoy it?! Unlike some murders, I have morals. I will not take the life of the innocent. But to bring justice to the wicked. That's the promise I made...after my mother left me." "What happened next?" "...Ever since my mom left, my father, I mean Gavin, teach me how to fight when I was 10 years old, I had my first sword at The age of 12." "What?!" "Keep your voice down. Do you want to get executed early?" Rebecca asks. "you've been combat training ever since?" "Yes. But it doesn't stop there. He gave me this mask." Rebecca said as she points to the mask that she's wearing. "he gave you a mask, why?" "to hide my identity? I don't know, I never ask him questions, but...it's like, he can look at me in the eyes again. And now he's talking about wars, dragons, and peacekeepers. He never tells me anything!" "do you ever questioned him? you have the right to know." "...I can't. I'm...scared of him. ever since, that one day."

" that one day, you mean...?" "Karosa, yes. Gavin told me who killed my mother. I was angry, I wanted revenge on the person who did it. Later that day we went to Karosa to confront her." "it's been a long time. With all the other peacekeepers gone you're the only one left." "Gavin ...i'm sorry... We were not able, to stop the darkness. we were not able... to save you." "Shut up!" Gavin Shouted then Gavin punched Sarah in the gut and through her at the wall. "Gavin called me to give the final stab. But I hesitated when I saw her eyes." "Her eyes?" "I can tell between a heartless killer and a grieving mother. Between the truth and the lies through their eyes. The King stepped even closer, the Oracle shrinking back slightly due to the closing proximity. " I would prefer if you refer to me by l, Halsey. You wish for a blessing for hunting, yes." She shook her head. " That's not what I do, I do not like to be seen as some sort of instrument. I simply peer into your future to give you advice. As for your reasoning I must say it is a bit more selfish than my usual requests." The King looked too of his men and they nodded, as they approached her.

Halsey slowly got to her feet. " Come now, let us be civil." She spoke realizing she had angered the king. " I see a darkness befalling you. Not during your hunting, but after. A lone dark figure. Driven by revenge shall rage a war against you. He shall turn the city against you, a new leader king rise... As for who will ultimately take the throne, I do not know as of now." Castronovo glared with anger. " What trickery is this, you lowly winch. Who is this usurper you speak of so I may quell this betrayal."

Halsey shook her head once more. " It is someone I knew, long ago. Though they have changed much..." The Lord chuckled boastfully. " It has been too long since a proper war raged. And now you gave me warning. Come Mandella, let us begin our hunt."
14122.title: Nothing happens and they see the oracle

choices: When they arrive the city is burned to the ground and the people want blood
Meanwhile a man convinces the town that dragon attack was the king's fault
141221.content:
Mandella couldn't stop thinking about the Oracle's words. The fact that someone would want to cause war was unabearable and who would take the throne. Was her father to die after this hunting trip? Mandella put the thought out of her mind and focused on hunting with her father. A few hours later Mandella had managed to snag the most wild beast out of the group thanks to her years of training.

"Good as always my dear daughter. You definitely take after your mother. You are both beautiful and strong. Can't believe it's been 22 years since you were born. Why don't you fetch some berries before we head back to the castle and cook up this beast that we got."

Mandella gave a faint smile before head into the woods. Mandella's mother had taught her how to cook before passing away three years ago. The death of her mother had taken a heavy toll on her father. She could go as far to say that her father became somewhat distant from the people. Mandella sighed as she started to pick some berries. After picking berries Mandella was on her way back until a large shadow soared above her head. She looked and saw a red dragon flying high in the sky. It is said that spotting a dragon could mean various things, but spotting one after having a fortune told about a possible civil war is definitely not a good sign. Judging by his speed at which he flew the dragon was heading towards Flareton.

Could that dragon have something to do with Madam Halsey's fortune? It must be. The perpetrator will use the dragon attack to sway the people. I must warn father at once! Mandella thought as she rushed off with her basket of berries.

King Castanovo watched the horizon and saw his daughter running with a grave expression on her face.

"Father! We need to head back immediately! I just saw a dragon fly towards Flareton! I believe that the traitor might use this incident to turn the people against you!"

"If what you say is true than we must go back."

Castronovo and his men hastily pack up and head towards the town.
141221.title: A Successful Hunt.

choices: How many of the townspeople rebuild in Flareton?
1412211.content:
The citizens of Flareton wanted payback and they were going to get it from the king, himself. The king asked the people to wait. "I'll rebuild like I always have. My castle was laid waste, too. This is the crown's property. after all.
A calm rational man spoke up, "I don't know about you but I'm going to rebuild, and demand answers later." With that he turned and departed through the crowd which split to let him through. Shortly afterward, the crowd broke up as each householder went home to assess their losses and decide if it was feasible to rebuild there.
1412211.title: When they arrive the city is burned to the grou...

14122111.content:
The townspeople began rebuilding the city. The king's knights helped out for they fear that the people might band together to bring down King Castronovo. Mandella did all she could to help too. She would often sneak away to hunt or fish, then prepare the food and give it to the people. However the people were only growing more disgruntled at the king. Of course when their leader decides to go hunting is when their city gets torched not by an army, but by a dragon. The people respect dragons but they do not like rogue dragons coming in and burning the city whenever they felt like. After each day of construction half of the population who were furious at the king would gather together and conspire late at night.

"I can't take this anymore!" One woman from the crowd shouted. "Are we just gonna let this slide! We were fortunate that no one lost their lives a few days ago when that dragon attacked!"

"What should we do then?" A man asked.

A man steps out from the crowd and addresses them.

"My fellow countrymen, I say we storm the castle and take the throne! With better leadership we'll finally be able to be better prepared for these surprise attacks. Most of our homes are rebuilt so let's decide when to raid the castle!" The vigorous man said.

"Tonight!" the crowd yelled.

"Very well my fellow countrymen, allow me Victor Blackcrest to lead the charge."

The townspeople assembled cheer as they go to fetch their weapons. thirty minutes later they begin marching to the incomplete castle. Fearing for his daughter's safety the king would send his daughter to a neighboring town to spend the night. Mandella was unaware of the fact that she might not see her father alive tomorrow.
14122111.title: Rebuilding the City.

choices: The wizard finds Mandella and tells her of what happened
While in human form Argos is asked to see the Oracle
141221111.content:
Victor Blackcrest led half of Flareton to the castle. The king's men assembled when they saw the rioters approach.

"Fellow countrymen! Stop this at once! Taking arms against the King Castronovo won't solve anything! It will only make things worse!" The rational man who spoke up a few days ago said, trying to persuade the people.

"Shut up! If you stand for the king and his rule we will kill you! Now step aside!" The crowd answered.

The rational man casts a barrier spell to block off the enraged townspeople.

"Break the barrier!" Victor Blackcrest shouted.

The townspeople start trying to break the barrier.

"You there! Take me to the king! I have to warn him of the danger that befalls the castle!" The rational man shouted.

"There's no need. I sent one of men to warn him wizard. This is going to be the worst civil war that Paragon has seen. It was many years ago that we had one this bad." the captain of the guard said.

"I've read about it, but now is not the time for us to talk casually. Does the princess know what's happening? If not then where can I find her?" The rational man asked.

"She's currently in Omerta. It is three hours from Flareton, but it is far enough from this place. I doubt that even with your magic that we can hold all these people off forever. I want you to find the princess and warn her. She'll know what to do from there."

"As you wish m'lord." The rational man said as he teleported away.

Just as he teleports away the barrier breaks. The townspeople then kill most of the guards and have invaded the throne room. Victor Blackcrest then makes a challenge to the king.

"Hear me of king for your days are numbered. I will kill you and all those loyal to you and claim your throne for myself!"

"I guess your the man that the Oracle spoke of."

"You mean that witch Halsey. We were friends until she said that my people would be murdered by your men a few years ago. Let us duel till the death. The winner gets the throne." Victor Blackcrest said.

King Castronovo and Victor exchange blows. They matched and countered each other perfectly, until Victor cheated by using magic. King Castronovo suffers a fatal blow and collapses.

"Your a monster. No man would do a cowardly act by using magic in a duel. Mandella... I'm... sorry." the king said before dying.

"I'm a man, but who said I had to play by the rules. It's time that I send my slave to destroy that princess and wizard. Omerta did he say? I'll have him scorch the town. Argos go to Omerta and burn it to the ground!" Victor said to the red dragon who just descended.

"No! I refuse to do any more of your dirty work!" Argos said as he readied a fireball.

Victor throws pixie dust at Argos.

"Arg!"

"That should teach you to defy my orders. Try that again and I will kill you with this Elvin sword."

Argos then takes flight. While airborne he makes a plan to betray Victor by joining the princess. To do this he would assume human form and act like a travelling mercenary.
141221111.title: The Siege

choices: Mandella routes out the assassin and fights him
Blackcrest's men barge in asking if the people saw a dragon
1412211111.content:
As the sun was rising over the city of Omerta Mandella was waking up. Last night she had a terrible nightmare that the townspeople threw a riot and killed her father. She was about to shake the feeling off until her aunt entered the room she was staying in.

"Mandella, get dressed. There is a young man here to see you."

Mandella quickly threw on a dress that her aunt gave her and was escorted to the wizard.

"Greetings your majesty, I bring terrible news. Your father..." The wizard stoped midway when he saw tears run down her eyes.

"He's dead. I thought it was only a nightmare, but how did it happen?" Mandella said as she wiped her tears away with a handkerchief.

"I was only there for a while, but I have a feeling that the rebel leader might have killed him."

"That's different than what I dreamed about last knight. In my dream he was killed by an executioner's ax and a man dressed in black armor was holding up his head."

"That is different than what I saw. The fates know what really happened."

Mandella's expression changes from sadness to anger.

"I will find my father's murderer and show him justice! I'll be right down. I just have to change into more suitable attire."

Mandella excuses herself and heads to her room to change into her ranger attire. Meanwhile the wizard asks the king of Omerta if he could lend any men.

"Your Highness, could you spare a few men to help us on our journey?" the wizard asked.

"I'm afraid not, but you should check out the guild. You it's inside the tavern. You might want to be careful boy for rumor on the street is that an assassin has been deployed to kill off me and my family. What's your name so I may remember you."

"I am Merlinius Manaspell." The wizard replied.

"It's nice to meet you Merlinius. I think my niece just got done changing." the King said as he noticed his niece in her ranger outfit.

"Let's head to the guild Merlinius." Mandella said as she headed towards the door.

Mandella had managed to catch the young wizard's name when she was walking from her room a minute ago. The twosome left the castle and waved goodbye, however a man dressed as an assassin was stalking them for he planned on killing them before they could leave town. Meanwhile Argos was at the guild drinking a fresh brew of coffee.

This is good. Rarely do we dragons get to enjoy the simplicity of human cuisine. I just have to wait for the princess and offer my services to her. Then I can kill that slave master, Victor Blackcrest for all that he's done to me and my kin. Dragons are noble and do not need to be treated like weapons of mass destruction. Argos thought as he drank his coffee.

Everything was going well until...
1412211111.title: The Queen's Calling

With her senses heightened by a lifetime as a Ranger the assassin doesn't go unnoticed. Mandella put a burst of speed, racing around the corner. "Crap, we have to go after him!"
Stepping into an open doorway she waits for him to go past then stepped out to deal with him by surprise. She gets in the first thrust and creases his ribs with a knife but he spins drawing two knives and puts a cut across her cheek.

Oracle.
True to her abilities the Oracle knows what Argos is and tells him what will befall him for saving the King's life.

A special organization known as the White Crimson Guard is responsible for maintaining that order. However an evil sorceress who goes by the name of the Centennial Duchess has made it her sole goal to destroy the Guardian Fragments and bring the world into chaos. She would do this by taking the DNA of living creatures and thus combine that DNA to create demons. These demons resembled dragons on a minute scale but their other features make them a menace. It is up to individuals from the White Crimson Guard to destroy these demons that are called Zargons. The individuals who fight are known as Warders. Warders use energy cultivated in the earth and the Guardian Fragments to fight the duchess and her minions. Which Warder will you follow?
142.title: The Quest to Collect the Guardian Fragments

1421.content:
Alice Rosa is a young Warder around 20 or 21. She might appear to be naive from time to time, but this serves as a farce that hides her clever and calculating side. As a young Warder it is up to her to pair up with a dragon ally in order to defeat the Centennial Duchess and her minions. Right now she is looking for one of the Guardian fragments that is located in the Upper Districts of Novanran. Everything was going smoothly until the Duchess showed her masked face.

"If it isn't the White Crimson Guard. You morons need to be destroyed!"

"Oh yeah, like that will happen. I will never negotiate with a witch like you!"

The Duchess summons her Zargon minion. The Zargon is about to attack until...
1421.title: Alice Rosa

Switch to the Centennial Duchess for the time being
14212.content:
The Zargon was about to attack until a fireball fell from the sky. Alice looks up only to see a gold and red dragon in the sky.

"You're a Warder. No matter, for I the Centennial Duchess will make sure that you fail."

"Just zip it nutcase! It's maniacs like you who started the war between our kind and humans in the first place! I see you still haven't changed after all of those years. Scram before I burn you to a crisp."

"Very well Sarckan, but I will see you again and when I do I'll destroy you and that Warder."

The Centennial Duchess disappears.

"Thanks Mr. Sarckan! The name's Alice Rosa. As you already know I'm a Warder from the White Crimson Guard. For a moment I thought I would have had to use my magic sword to take out that Zargon."

"Don't worry. I'll make sure that the peace between mankind and dragons never dies!"

With that Alice and Sarckan obtain a Guardian Fragment.

143.content:
The sun rested on the horizon as it provided an unearthly glow to the Citadel. " Mother, I don't want to go!" Vega shouted as his mother wiped tears from her eyes as she kneeled down. " I.. I know, my love... But this your calling in life... Its what you shall become... I love you so very much." She hugged Vega close for what seemed forever, then felt all too brief. She gently placed her hand under his chin so he would look to her as she took off her necklace, placing it in his hand. " I believe in you, my Vega." As she spoke he took in her every detail how the shadow brightened her brown hair, and how her green eyes looked into his. He was taken out of the trance by the loud sound of the large door slowly opening. Two heavily armored men now stood before him, their seemingly faceless appearance making him fallow them in without a word.

Vega stood in the large hallway staring blankly at the floor. " Welcome little one. You must be, Vega Bacara, correct?" He jolted back to reality an replied with a meager "yes". Standing before him stood a young woman in a long brown robe, her long blonde hair creating a flowing underneath her ornate crest. " We expect great things from you. Please walk with me, I would like to walk with you." With that she turned slowly on her heel as she motioned for him to follow her.

Vega fallowed her down the corridor. He looked to either sides to see sprawling librarys with many people sitting at desks. " Youve been born into dark times. A sharp mind could be the key to survival." He staired in awa. On one side were kids around his age, the other side were older people. As they walked a bit further the sound of clashing metal sounded. In a large courtyard were lots of people sparring. One in particular was a brutal fistfight between two men as others cheered. " But it will be your inherent physical traits that win the day." With that one fighter tackled the other, ending the fight.

They walked up a spiral staircase as his mind flooded with curiosity. " You shall be a Sangil Warrior, something truly special. Your weapons, your armor, and most importantly your brothers. Hunters fight together too bring down much larger prey, so to shall you." They now stood in a small room with three beds and two the children his age. " And now, join your new family. Samwell Toran." She motions towards the taller boy who nodded warmingly. " And Talia Shawn." The girl waved sheepishly at him. " Go now and speak with them. I shall see you in the morning."

As she walked out an armored man who stood a head taller then the woman entered who bore the crest of a bull. " Ah, so your the new kid. Well its curfew." He spoke bluntly as the other two children quickly got in bed. " But I just got her. I don't want to go to bed." Vega stated defiantly. The man stopped in his tracks as the other two kids looked back in fear. He slowly turned around, he took the necklace from his hand and seemingly inspected it. Untel a loud crack could be heard.

Vega no longer felt sorrow, but anger as he tried to strike the man. He felt the man harshly knee him in the chest as he fell to the floor. " Good, remember that hate. one day it will fuel you. Now go to bed." Vega did so, but still focused on hate as he fell asleep.

Vega stood talking to Samwell and Talia. They all had become exactly what they were needed to be, Samwell was still very large standing 6'5. High Counciler Moril waiting for her "flock" to quite down." I would like to congratulate you all on becomeing exemplary warriors.
